import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { Button, Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' const CreateForm = () => { let ProductName,ProductCode,Img,UnitPrice,Qty,TotalPrice = useRef(); const SaveData = ()=>{ let Product_Name = ProductName.value let ProductCode = ProductCode.value let Img = Img.value let UnitPrice = UnitPrice.value let Qty = Qty.value let TotalPrice = TotalPrice.value } return (
ProductName=input} type="text" className='form-control' /> ProductCode=input} type="text" className='form-control' /> Img=input} type="text" className='form-control' /> UnitPrice=input} type="text" className='form-control' /> Qty=input} type="text" className='form-control' /> TotalPrice=input} type="text" className='form-control' />
) } export default CreateForm
